channel.title: How do you add monster drops
channel.description:
Simple question, most likely an easy answer...I want to learn how to make "random" drops for monsters, and also how to make a drop so that the same thing/s ALWAYS drop when the monster dies. (Notice I said thing/s.)
Thanks ;)
Edit: [b][u]PLEASE BE AS SPECIFIC AS POSSIBLE![/u][/b]

item.title: How do you add monster drops
item.dc:creator: @bananaman bananaman
item.description:
@bananaman wrote:

Ok go to npc drops.cfg open with notepad
cntrl+F the npc id you want and if you go across it says the item id it already has or 0 change the 0 to the item id and the amount next to it. then compile and run your server…hope this helped…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add monster drops
